column5: Heading up on Monday.  Anyone know of good spot to buy some minnows?
what lake you'll be fishing? afaik Marten Lake is closed for ice fishing this year...
Discount bait and tackle is about 100 feet off hwy. 11 right in town, plus a few other options right in north bay but nothing in between
That's who I get my leeches and minnows from.

North Bay Outfitters - Lakeshore Dr Billy Bob's Bait - Lakeshore Dr Bob's / Trout Lake Bait and Tackle - Trout Lake Rd  Are all good places with resonable prices.  Also, check out this site I came across, shows bait & tackle shops all over Canada.  http://www.baitandtackle411.com/
The gift shop/gas station in Marten River has minnows.
